sentences.en: ...the suppression of the proletariat by the bourgeoisie.
sentences.cn: ...资产阶级对无产阶级的压迫。

sentences.en: A symbol of the French royal family and Paris bourgeoisie Union.
sentences.cn: 象征法国王室和巴黎资产阶级联盟.

sentences.en: China's Xinxinrenlei services, the quality of life of petty bourgeoisie crowd.
sentences.cn: 服务中国的新新人类,具有小资生活品位的人群.

sentences.en: Encroachment on any enterprise run by the national bourgeoisie is strictly prohibited.
sentences.cn: 一切民族资产阶级经营的企业,严禁侵犯.

sentences.en: From these burgesses the first elements of the bourgeoisie were developed.
sentences.cn: 从这个市民等级中发展出最初的资产阶级分子.

sentences.en: Is it possible that a new bourgeoisie will emerge?
sentences.cn: 会不会产生新的资产阶级?

sentences.en: Popularize what is needed and can be readily accepted by the bourgeoisie?
sentences.cn: 用资产阶级所需要、所便于接受的东西 吗 ?

sentences.en: The armed struggle was initiated by the petty bourgeoisie.
sentences.cn: 武装斗争是由小资产阶级所发动的.

sentences.en: The bourgeoisie has subjected the country to the rule of the towns.
sentences.cn: 资产阶级使农村屈服于城市的统治.

sentences.en: the rise of the bourgeoisie in the nineteenth century
This charge was enlarged into assault on the bourgeoisie as a whole.
sentences.cn: 这项收费是扩大到对整个资产阶级的进攻.

sentences.en: Unity here means the united front with the bourgeoisie.
sentences.cn: 这里所谓联合,就是同资产阶级的统一战线.

sentences.en: What the bourgeoisie, therefore , produces, above all, is its own grave - diggers.
sentences.cn: 它首先生产的是它自身的掘墓人.

sentences.en: Which leads which -- the proletariat the bourgeoisie, or vice versa?
sentences.cn: 无产阶级 领导资产阶级, 还是资产阶级领导无产阶级?

sentences.en: Without doubt , the national bourgeoisie tends to vacillate , but we should , nevertheless, make use of its positive side, uniting with it as well as struggling against it.
sentences.cn: 民族资产阶级 当然 是动摇的, 但是要利用它的积极的一面, 要有团结有斗争.

sentences.en: You know the French film, The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie?
sentences.cn: 你知道法国电影, 《资产阶级的审慎魅力》?

phrases.tran_cn: n. 小资产阶级（等于petite bourgeoisie）

trans.tran_en: the people in a society who are rich, educated, own land etc, according to Marxism
